messages: You dream of a video game played against an unending horde of aliens.
You dream of turning on a radio, but all you hear is the distinctive static of the Xenoids.
You dream of being eviscerated alive by Xenoids wearing human skin.
You dream of being in a small steel cage, with large Xenoids looking at you from outside.
You dream of continuous static-crackling sounds, interspared with Xenoid speech.
You dream of an old love, but before you reach them, they are killed by Xenoid Knights.
